art.author: blovedme
art.post: 13 years ago I tried committing suicide. A man appeared to me and I remember His beautiful eyes. He said the following to me “You belong to me, the enemy will not claim your life” – when I saw this picture I started crying, those eyes, it was familiar! Could it have been Jesus Himself who saved me that day. Today I am whole again and living a life of influence. Jesus saves.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
